Text:
To compare Holocaust  with a war on Balkans is cynicism and an insult to all Jewish people that got killed by the german murderers. That is something only a Croat (and everyone knows that Croats loved nazi-politics) can do.

This crap about the Milosevic's own speeches is just that: fantasy.

Here is a transcript of Milosevic's speech and I see only tolerance: http://www.slobodan-milosevic.org/spch-kosovo1989.htm

He may have been a son of a bitch but I would have rather put him in jail myself (as he harmed me personally) instead of letting other mass-murderer like Clinton and Blair do that.
Can't we all just get along?
We can get along just fine without bigots who use prop up their pseudo-righteousness with phrases like "That is something only a Croat can do"...
We all do get along but we don't like nazi-bastards. Who does? :)
